name: MacFlex Backpack Granite Red
name_cn: 麦克福莱克斯背包 花岗岩红
description:
Item Type: Light Backpack
Carrying Capacity: 50K µSCU
Core Compatibility: All
The MacFlex Backpack is a back-mounted hard-shell case that provides extra commodity storage options. Whether bringing extra supplies on a long excursion or filling it with ore after a successful mining run, the MacFlex Backpack will be there to carry the load.
description_cn:
物品类型：轻型背包
储物空间：50K µSCU
可适配胸甲类型：全部
麦克福莱克斯背包是一款背部安装的硬壳箱具，能够提供额外的商品储物选择。无论是远行时携带额外补给，还是在成功的开采工作后装满矿石，麦克福莱克斯背包都能为您装下烦恼。
